encryptedTicTacToe

Class Crypt

  • java.lang.Object
    • encryptedTicTacToe.Crypt

  • public class Crypt
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods used for message encryption and decryption

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Crypt() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String decryptMessage(byte[] msg)
      Decrypts a given message and converts it from Byte array to String.
      byte[] encryptMessage(java.lang.String msg)
      Encrypts a given message and converts it from String to Byte array using the previously exchanged cryptographic keys.
      void receiveSecureConnectionKey(Chat chat)
      Receives the AES key from the other client.
      void sendSecureConnectionKey(Chat chat)
      Generates a symmetric AES encryption key and transmits it to the other client.

    • Method Detail

      • sendSecureConnectionKey

        public void sendSecureConnectionKey(Chat chat)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException,
                                    java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                    javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException,
                                    java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                    javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                                    javax.crypto.BadPaddingException,
                                    java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Generates a symmetric AES encryption key and transmits it to the other client. For this, the method waits for the other user to send his public RSA key, then encrypts the AES key using RSA to send the AES key securely.
        Parameters:
        chat - The chat component the communication is taking place on
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException
        java.security.InvalidKeyException
        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException
        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

      • receiveSecureConnectionKey

        public void receiveSecureConnectionKey(Chat chat)
                                throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                       java.io.IOException,
                                       javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                                       javax.crypto.BadPaddingException,
                                       java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                       javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException,
                                       java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Receives the AES key from the other client. For this, a public RSA key is generated and sent to the other user so that he can encrypt and securely send the AES key.
        Parameters:
        chat - The chat component the communication is taking place on
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.io.IOException
        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException
        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
        java.security.InvalidKeyException
        javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

      • encryptMessage

        public byte[] encryptMessage(java.lang.String msg)
                      throws java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                             java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                             javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException,
                             javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                             javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
        Encrypts a given message and converts it from String to Byte array using the previously exchanged cryptographic keys.
        Parameters:
        msg - The String to encrypt
        Returns:
        The encrypted message as byte array
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException
        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException
        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException

      • decryptMessage

        public java.lang.String decryptMessage(byte[] msg)
                                throws java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                       java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                       javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException,
                                       javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                                       javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
        Decrypts a given message and converts it from Byte array to String.
        Parameters:
        msg - The message as Byte array
        Returns:
        The decrypted message as String
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException
        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException
        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
